newsitem.title: SWITZERLAND: Feldschloesschen upbeat on profit outlook.
newsitem.headline: Feldschloesschen upbeat on profit outlook.

text.p: Swiss brewing and mineral water group Feldschloesschen-Huerlimann Holding AG said it was confident it would reach its profit targets for the 1996/97 business year ending in September.

"On the basis of current business developments and the beverage season that is just starting, the Feldschloesschen group is confident of reaching the revenue and profit targets presented...in March," it said in a statement.
They included sales of 1.12 bilion Swiss francs, EBIT of 59 million and 20 million in net profit, a spokesman said.
